data.title: Waxing Bali: Bikini Waxing, Brazilian Waxing & Body Waxing In Bali
data.meta_description: Thinking of being waxed in Bali? It's a great idea and we've got 20 excellent salons where you can get your hot wax treatments on the island.
data.text:
Looking for waxing services in Bali? Then there are some awesome salons here, from your first Brazilian wax to a simple hot wax around the bikini line, there’s something for everyone here.

The salons in Bali will minimize the risk of ingrown hairs and provide the kind of waxing service that you would get from a professional at home but without a big price tag.

Yes, prices for everything from leg waxing to a G-string wax are lower in the salons of the island than in the West! So, get your waxing needs met and your hair removal done without any painful drains on your wallet!

20 Great Options For A Waxing Salon In Bali

They do all types of body waxing at the Bulu Waxing Salon and you will find their waxing services are first-rate.

If you’re looking for your first Brazilian wax or first bikini wax, then you may find that hair removal here is as painless as it gets.

Where Is It? Jl.Subak Sari.83, Ruko No.3, Tibubeneng, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Instagram

HiSugars Seminyak

They don’t just do a first-rate job of Brazilian waxing at HiSugars they also invented manzilian waxing which is the same kind of waxing but for men.

If you want your nether regions to feel soft and brand new, then book a hair removal appointment with this popular salon in Seminyak.

Where Is It? Jalan Batubelig 38, Seminyak, Kerobokan, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: HiSugars

Let’s Waxing & Facial Bali

They may not have the most grammatically correct of names but they have a great reputation for being a waxing service that you can rely on to sort out your bikini line without leaving you with any ingrown hairs.

This is one of the best value places for waxing on the island too.

Where Is It? Jimbaran nusadua, Jl. Giri Puspa No.16 block c, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Let’s Waxing

Pro Epil House (Lazer – Waxing – Sugaring)

If you need hair removal, they can handle it at Pro Epil and not only will they do a flawless bikini wax but they can also use lasers and sugaring to ensure you’re fully smooth when they’re done.

Where Is It? Jl. Raya Kerobokan Villa Tukad Alit No.12, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kebupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Pro Epil

OmahWax

They offer a full range of waxing and threading services at this salon and their bikini wax is near legendary in Kerobokan.

It’s a very small place though and you may want to opt for somewhere a little bigger if you’re planning on a long process.

Where Is It? Jl. Raya Semer, Kerobokan, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80111, Indonesia

Online: Instagram

Glo Day Spa

This is a brand-new spa from the long-established Glo brand here in Bali and they can do bikini waxing and Brazilian waxing with the best of them.

Where Is It? Jl. Kayu Aya No.1, Seminyak, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Glo Spa

Goldust Spa

Hair removal can’t get much easier than the waxing service at Goldust Spa. One thing everyone agrees on is that it’s never a painful service at this spa.

Where Is It? Jl. Pantai Batu Bolong Gg. Nyepi, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Goldust

VS House Of Beauty Bali

They do a bikini wax or G-String Wax with aplomb at this pleasant beauty salon in Kuta. If you want a good deal on waxing, this is a great salon to visit.

Where Is It? Jl. Dewi Sri II No.22B, Legian, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: MSHA

Sister Co Wax Care, Denpasar

This is the best place for bikini waxing and other waxing services in Denpasar and as you’d expect for this area, it’s very popular with locals.

Where Is It? Jl. Tukad Irawadi No.A3, Dauh Puri Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80225, Indonesia

Online: Instagram

HiSugars Canggu

This branch of HiSugars can also handle all your bikini wax and other hair removal needs and it’s very easy to make an appointment online.

Where Is It? Jl. Sempol No.25, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia

Online: Online Booking

Waxing Bali

They offer eyebrow waxing and shaping as well as bikini waxing and the other standard hair removal services at this clinic.

Where Is It? Jl. Pengubengan Kauh No.17a, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Instagram

Sugarbomb Bali

Sugarbomb has a first-rate reputation for Brazilian waxing and it’s very conveniently located in Seminyak near the beaches.

Where Is It? Ruko Drupadi Corner, Jl. Drupadi blok H, Seminyak, Kec. Kuta, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Sugarbomb

ReWax Studio

There’s no hair removal process that they can’t tackle at ReWax, if you want your shoulders, chest or any other part of your body attended to, they’ll be there for you.

Where Is It? Jl. Petitenget No.8M, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: ReWax

Silvi Hair & Wax

A very nice place where they do hair styling as well as hair removal. That’s a pretty logical pairing and getting a bikini wax and then a haircut is fun.

Where Is It? Jl. Pengubengan Kauh No.69A, Kerobokan Kelod, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Instagram

Ameline Beauty & Spa

There’s no pain with bikini waxing at Ameline Spa. They’re very kind and patient and focused on the best outcome for you.

Where Is It? Jalan Padang Linjong, Canggu, Bali, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia

Online: Ameline

Sky Wax Bali

This is a very small clinic with cute decor where you can get a great bikini wax or any other kind of waxing service.

Where Is It? Jl. Pegending Utama II, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Instagram

Heaven Aesthetic Lounge

This is a very locally focused waxing establishment and the bikini waxing service is very good and quite cheap too.

Where Is It? Jl. Nelayan No.30B, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

Online: Mynx

FAQs

How Much Does Waxing Cost In Bali?

It depends on both the waxing salon and the process you’re undergoing. A wax for your bikini area is likely to set you back between 150,000 IDR ($10 USD or $15 AUD) and 450,000 IDR ($30 USD or $45 AUD).

The majority of your investment in a bikini wax, body waxing, a Brazilian wax, strip wax, etc. is in the salon facilities. Wax itself is generally not that expensive.

Can You Get A Wax In Bali?

Yes! See our list above, it’s very easy to get a wax in Bali and it’s quite cheap too. You can get other cosmetic services too such as spray tanning.

Is It Embarrassing To Get Brazilian Wax?

As long as you visit a professional salon for your Brazilian wax, it won’t be embarrassing at all. Yes, you will have to expose your pubic area but the women who work in these establishments are all about ensuring you have a smooth and comfortable time there.

How Many Days Before My Trip Should I Get A Brazilian Wax?

If you’re having a Brazilian wax or bikini wax done in Bali, we’d recommend doing it 2-3 days before you fly out of the country or catch a boat off the island.

That’s because the bikini area can get a little sore for a couple of days and even itch. Once you’ve waited, you’ll find that everything calms down and you can travel with confidence again.

Final Thoughts On Getting A Bikini Wax, Brazilian Wax Or Body Wax In Bali

Bali is a great place for body waxing, bikini waxing, Brazilian waxing, leg waxing, Manzilian waxing, and much more.

Hair removal has never been so easy or so painless as it is here and a session with a professional salon won’t set you back a fortune, either.
